rubrics.rubric: Stiffness of spine and sacroiliac joints < morning, > motion
rubrics.modality: Worse after rest or sleep; better by movement or hot applications

rubrics.rubric: Ankylosis tendency with loss of spinal flexibility
rubrics.modality: Hard bony back; cannot bend or twist easily
rubrics.notes: Late-stage or degenerative phase of AS

rubrics.rubric: Back pain radiating to hips, thighs or knees (sciatica-like)
rubrics.modality: Tearing, pulling, worse at night, better by flexing limbs

rubrics.rubric: Back pain < lying still, > stretching or activity
rubrics.modality: Pain drives patient to keep shifting position
rubrics.notes: Key differentiator from mechanical back pain

rubrics.rubric: Inflammation of sacroiliac joints with morning pain & stiffness
rubrics.modality: Worse on first rising; limited movement early in day

rubrics.rubric: Stiffness ascending upward from lumbar to thoracic/cervical region
rubrics.modality: Back feels like it will break if bent backward

rubrics.rubric: Chronic pain in young males with family history of arthritis or TB
rubrics.notes: Often genetic background contributes to autoimmune trigger

rubrics.rubric: AS worsened after grief, prolonged stress or suppression
rubrics.modality: Timeline of emotional trauma → back stiffness

rubrics.rubric: Back pain with deformity, hunched posture, spinal rigidity
rubrics.modality: Neck and thoracic curve fixed or deformed

rubrics.rubric: AS with fatigue, restlessness, and cold sweat
rubrics.modality: Low vitality; chronic pain wears down system
rubrics.notes: Vital force depleted; body can’t recover

rubrics.rubric: AS with genetic/family history of TB, RA, psoriasis
rubrics.modality: Early onset AS in hot, restless, thin individuals
rubrics.notes: Classical background miasm seen in early autoimmune inflammation

rubrics.rubric: Ankylosis or bony fusion of spine or sacroiliac joint
AS with recurrent relapses despite indicated remedy
rubrics.modality: Gets better with remedy, but relapses again; new complaints emerge
rubrics.notes: Vital force obstruction or layer blockage

rubrics.rubric: AS with suppressed skin eruptions (eczema, psoriasis)
rubrics.modality: Never well since suppression; itching may shift to joints

rubrics.rubric: AS with deep grief, humiliation, or suppressed anger
AS cases with deformity, despair, suicidal thoughts
rubrics.modality: Feels hopeless, worse at night, suicidal thoughts with pain
rubrics.notes: Used in degenerative + psychological collapse stage

rubric: Neck pain and stiffness with stooped or bent forward posture
modality: Neck locked in bent position; spinal rigidity; worse cold wind
notes: Seen in late stage of AS with cervical involvement

rubric: Back pain better after walking fast or stretching violently
modality: Pain compels movement; can’t rest for long
notes: Restless joint pain, very characteristic of inflammatory spine

rubric: Spinal vertebrae sensitive to pressure or even light touch
modality: Can't lean on backrest or bed; intense soreness of spine
notes: Seen in early vertebral inflammation stage

rubric: Back stiffness and pain worse after damp weather or getting wet
modality: Even minor rain exposure flares up back pain
notes: Classic of rheumatic patients with weather sensitivity

rubric: AS in tall, lean, narrow-chested subjects with TB family history
modality: Weak bones, nervous temperament, early deformities
notes: Often shows fast joint destruction despite good vitality
